GROUP COMPANIES

Unimak expanded its business activities by acquiring two sister companies, Union and Unimak Foreign Trade.

Union Ltd. is a marketing company active in the automotive industry, dealing with sales of interior trim materials.

mail@union.com.tr www.union.com.tr

Unimak Foregin Trade is the exporter of Unimak machines and is also involved in agencies for different ceramic related activities.

mail@unimak.com www.unimak.com
